project_overview: Production-ready headless e-commerce storefront built on Next.js App Router with Shopify Storefront API integration

features.name: Homepage
features.description: Main landing page with featured products, hero section, and trust signals
user_stories: As a visitor, I want to see featured products so I can quickly discover popular items
As a visitor, I want to see trust signals so I can feel confident purchasing
As a visitor, I want clear navigation so I can explore the site easily
acceptance_criteria: Homepage loads within 2 seconds
Hero section displays prominently with CTA
Featured products display with images, titles, and prices
Trust signals are visible and accessible
All interactive elements are keyboard accessible
Mobile responsive design works correctly

features.name: Product Detail Page
features.description: Detailed product information with images, specifications, and purchase options
user_stories: As a shopper, I want to view detailed product information so I can make informed purchase decisions
As a shopper, I want to see high-quality product images so I can visualize the product
As a shopper, I want to add products to cart so I can purchase them
acceptance_criteria: Product images load and are viewable
Product title, price, and description are displayed
Add to cart button is functional
Technical specifications are clearly formatted
Page is SEO optimized with proper meta tags
Mobile responsive layout

features.name: Shopping Cart
features.description: Cart management with item review, quantity adjustment, and checkout
user_stories: As a shopper, I want to see all items in my cart so I can review my purchases
As a shopper, I want to update item quantities so I can adjust my order
As a shopper, I want to remove items so I can change my mind
As a shopper, I want to proceed to checkout so I can complete my purchase
acceptance_criteria: All cart items display with images, titles, prices
Quantity adjustment works correctly
Remove item functionality works
Cart total calculates correctly
Checkout button is prominent and accessible
Empty cart state displays appropriately

features.name: Product Search
features.description: Search functionality for finding products quickly
user_stories: As a shopper, I want to search for products so I can find what I need quickly
As a shopper, I want to see relevant search results so I can find the right product
acceptance_criteria: Search input is accessible in header
Search executes on form submit
Search results display with product information
No results state displays helpful message
Search is fast (< 1 second)

features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Account creation, login, and profile management
user_stories: As a new user, I want to register an account so I can track my orders
As a returning user, I want to log in so I can access my account
As a logged-in user, I want to view my order history
acceptance_criteria: Registration form validates all required fields
Login form authenticates users securely
JWT tokens are issued and stored securely
Error messages are clear and helpful
Session management works correctly

features.name: Product Collections
user_stories: As a shopper, I want to browse products by category so I can find related items
acceptance_criteria: Collections page displays all available collections
Collection detail page shows all products in that collection
Products display with images and prices
